name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Iterate AI: Create event tracking plan for your web app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Point to any UI element or page in your web app and propmt the event name and event properties you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Iterate AI’s chrome extension helps Product Managers create event tracking plan for any feature of their web app. 

PMs have to simply point to any UI element or page, prompt the event name, event properties they want, and the sample values for the properties - that’s it!

The chrome extension gives a robust downloadable tracking plan which has trigger screenshot, background page screenshot, background page URL, and property data types added along with the event name and property names defined by the PM.
